achievements: Wrote lyrics for numerous Broadway musicals and films, including Porgy and Bess.
Won an Academy Award for Best Original Song in 1935 for 'They Can't Take That Away From Me'.
Known for his experimental poetry and films.
Published numerous books of poetry and prose, including 'The Green Dragon'.
One of the six Marines who raised the American flag on Iwo Jima during World War II.
Immortalized in the iconic photograph taken by Joe Rosenthal.
